alert.note: Alert for Bay; Walton (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued November 30 at 8:54AM EST until November 30 at 9:30AM EST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Tornado Warning for... West central Bay County in the Panhandle of Florida... South central Walton County in the Panhandle of Florida... * Until 830 AM CST. * At 753 AM CST, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located 12 miles west of Panama City Beach, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Tornado. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. * This dangerous storm will be near... Panama City Beach around 805 AM CST. Panama City around 820 AM CST. Other locations impacted by this tornadic thunderstorm include West Bay, Inlet Beach, Edgewater Gulf Beach, Sunnyside, Laird, Laguna Beach, Gulf Resort Beach, West Panama City, Hollywood Beach and Bahama Beach. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
